content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm pleased to negotiate with you. Let's start with the rental price. How much are you willing to pay for this newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center? Remember, I want the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in the apartment, but I'm looking to pay a fair price. I'm a student, and I need to be mindful of my expenses. I'm smart and responsible, and I want to establish a good relationship with my landlord. How much are we looking at for the rent?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your honesty, Mr. Wang. However, I need to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Let's start with a price of 1500 euros per month. I'm sure you'll find that the location, close to all important facilities, is worth the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 1500 euros per month is quite high for me as a student. I'm looking for something more reasonable. Perhaps we can discuss a lower price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your concern, Mr. Wang. However, I must get the highest price possible for my apartment. How about we meet in the middle at 1250 euros per month? This is a fair price considering the location and amenities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 1250 euros per month is still quite steep for me. I'm hoping to find something more in the range of 800 to 900 euros per month. Would that be possible?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Mr. Wang, but that price is far below my expectations. I need to get the highest price possible for my apartment. I can't accept such a low price. Therefore, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is far below my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. If we cannot find a price that is acceptable to both of us, then I'm willing to look for other options. I appreciate your time, and I hope we can reach a mutually agreeable solution.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. If you are unable to meet my price, then it's best to end the negotiation. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is far below my expectations. I wish you luck in your search for an apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your time as well. I'll continue my search for an apartment that fits within my budget. If you have any other properties that might be more suitable, I would be interested in seeing those.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. I'll keep you in mind if I have any other properties that might fit your needs. If we didn't agree on a price, then the negotiation is terminated. Therefore, in this case, 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
